Just some friendly forum mojo:

At the bottom of the page under "Thread Display Options", in "Sort Threads By" choose "Thread Start Time" and click the "Show Threads" button. This will list them by OP date, so you get all the new threads and none of the long, older ones. (This is also a great way to find new mods in the Add-On Release section without them all being bumped by the busy threads.)

Apologies if that is what you were already doing. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
